channel.title: CVE Feed for Hi Security Lab -- Virus Cleaner - Antivirus, Booster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hi Security Lab -- Virus Cleaner - Antivirus, Booster

item.title: CVE-2017-13105|2024-08-05T18:58:12.271Z -- hi%20security%20lab -- virus%20cleaner%20-%20antivirus%2C%20booster
item.description: Hi Security Virus Cleaner - Antivirus, Booster, 3.7.1.1329, 2017-09-13, Android application accepts all SSL certificates during SSL communication. This opens the application up to a man-in-the-middle attack having all of its encrypted traffic intercepted and read by an attacker.
